overview: Cédric Dupuis, dreaming of fame, decides to make the greatest horror film of all time with his friends, but discovered to his cost the joys of shooting and a non-professional team, he goes to excess anger killed his wife Aline. Following the murder, he quickly realizes that now he has no choice but to make his own documentary, and will decide to run his team, but justifying his murders by the construction of a screenplay film.
title: Making-Off
